using namespace std;

#define Windows_x 1100
#define Windows_y 731
#define maze_x 180
#define maze_y 130

MOUSEMSG m;//é¼ æ ‡å¯¹è±¡

struct  pos//å­˜å‚¨æ¯ä¸ªæ ¼å­å·¦ä¸Šå’Œå³ä¸‹çš„åæ ‡
{
    int x1, y1;
    int x2, y2;
} map[30][30];

int maze[30][30] = { 0 };//å¹¿æœä¸­çš„æŠ½è±¡åœ°å›¾

struct node
{
    int x, y, s;
} s, e;
int go[4][2] = { { 1,0 },{ -1,0 },{ 0,1 },{ 0,-1 } };
int pre[1000001] = { 0 };
int vis[25][25];
void init();//åˆå§‹åŒ–ç•Œé¢
void start();//æ¸¸æˆé€»è¾‘åˆ†æ
int bfs(int x, int y);//è¿›è¡Œå¹¿æœ

int bfs(int x, int y)
{
    node now, to;
    now.x = x, now.y = y, now.s = 0;
    queue <node>q;
    vis[x][y] = 1;
    q.push(now);
    while (!q.empty())
    {
        now = q.front();
        q.pop();
        if (now.x == e.x&&now.y == e.y)
            return now.s;
        for (int i = 0; i<4; i++)
        {
            int xx = now.x + go[i][0];
            int yy = now.y + go[i][1];
            if (xx >= 0 && xx<20 && yy >= 0 && yy<20 && maze[xx][yy] == 0 && !vis[xx][yy])
            {
                vis[xx][yy] = 1;
                to.x = xx, to.y = yy, to.s = now.s + 1;
                pre[xx * 20 + yy] = now.x * 20 + now.y;
                q.push(to);
            }
        }
    }
    return -1;
}

queue<node>stk;//ç”¨é˜Ÿåˆ—æ¥å­˜å‚¨è·¯å¾„
void myprint(int n)//å›æº¯å¯»æ‰¾è·¯å¾„
{
    if (-1 == pre[n])return;
    myprint(pre[n]);
    node t;
    t.x = n / 20, t.y = n % 20;
    stk.push(t);
}

    drawtext("è®¾ç½®èµ·ç‚¹", &r1, DT_CENTER | DT_VCENTER | DT_SINGLELINE);
    drawtext("è®¾ç½®ç»ˆç‚¹", &r2, DT_CENTER | DT_VCENTER | DT_SINGLELINE);

    int MODE = 0;//å½“å‰æŒ‰é’®æ‰€è¡¨ç¤ºçš„äº‹ä»¶

    while (true)

                {

                    setfillcolor(RGB(131, 175, 155));

                    drawtext("è®¾ç½®ç»ˆç‚¹", &r2, DT_CENTER | DT_VCENTER | DT_SINGLELINE);

def get_score():
    score_num=[]
    for i in range(6):
        score_num.append(0)
    list=os.listdir()
    for name in list:
        if len(name)==24:
            score=float(name[:3])
            if score>=3 and score<4:
                score_num[0]+=1
            elif score>=4 and score<5:
                score_num[1]+=1
            elif score>=5 and score<6:
                score_num[2]+=1
            elif score>=6 and score<7:
                score_num[3]+=1
            elif score>=7 and score<8:
                score_num[4]+=1
            elif score>=8 and score<=9:
                score_num[5]+=1
    return score_num

def autolabel(rects):
    for rect in rects:
        height = rect.get_height()
        plt.text(rect.get_x()+ 0.3, height+ 0.05, '%d' % height, ha='center', va='bottom')

def draw_column():
    score=get_score()
    plt.title('nyistè¯ä»¶ç…§é¢œå€¼åˆ†æ•°åˆ†æ   æ€»æ•°ï¼š2118')
    plt.xlabel('é¢œå€¼åŒºé—´')
    plt.ylabel('äººæ•°')
    plt.xticks([0,1,2,3,4,5], ['3~4åˆ†', '4~5åˆ†','5~6åˆ†','6~7åˆ†','7~8åˆ†','8~9åˆ†'])
    rect=plt.bar(left=(0,1,2,3,4,5), height=score, width=0.7, align="center")
    plt.legend((rect,), ('æ•°é‡',))
    autolabel(rect)
    plt.show()

def draw_circle():
    score = get_score()
    labels='3~4åˆ†', '4~5åˆ†','5~6åˆ†','6~7åˆ†','7~8åˆ†','8~9åˆ†'
    sizes=score
    explode=(0,0,0,0.05,0,0)
    plt.pie(sizes,explode=explode,labels=labels,autopct='%1.1f%%',shadow=False,startangle=90)
    plt.axis('equal')
    plt.show()
